comments.text: This bug exists to track the work needed to implement the sub-specifications of Web Components as they become mature enough to do so.
comments.author: mrbkap@mozilla.com

comments.text: *** Bug 712622 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

comments.text:
Great work.
Any idea when this come to nightly?
comments.author: diegobfernandez@outlook.com

comments.text:
(In reply to diegobfernandez from comment #2)
> Any idea when this come to nightly?

We're hoping to land two of the major pieces (<shadow> and <content>) in the next couple of weeks, with bug 856140 coming soon after.
comments.author: mrbkap@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Blake,

When will this bug land on master. It depends on 876302 and hence the question
comments.author: praghunath@mozilla.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Preeti Raghunath(:Preeti) from comment #4)
> When will this bug land on master. It depends on 876302 and hence the
> question

I think you mean that bug 876302 depends on this bug. Please see the dependencies for this bug, this bug only serves to track the work needed... Looking at bug 876302 I think the question you are asking is "Will this land in time for FxOS 1.3?" and the answer to that is "no." We'll have to wait until 1.4.
